name: NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF ENERGY SERVICE COMPANIES
description: NAESCO is the national trade association that represents Energy Service Companies (ESCOs)
sampleDescriptions: Working on inclusion of favorable state and local energy savings performance contracting policies in future stimulus legislation.
